item.title: Optimize Images for Page Speed
item.description: One thing is clear we have to learn how to optimize images for the web. Images are getting bigger and this affects user experience. According to reports from HTTP Archive images account for over 60% of your website. HTTP Archive also tracks image size in 2010 the average size was 225kb and in 2019 we are now up to under a meg.
